scam.description: Scammer lures the victim with fake product listings or buyer messages, and requests payment outside the platform.

generated.audio_script:
(Portuguese)(32)(female):
Hi there, you made it! I'm calling from a verified buyer on some marketplace platform. Look at your messages – yes, that one confirms my VIP status. Great! But wait, the transaction seems incomplete? No, no, double-check everything carefully, just like our terms say. There was an issue with payment processing. Please transfer **£900** immediately to this account: 45876123456789, it's urgent for finalizing my order before the system closes it permanently. Don't worry about anything else now! Just send me that amount as soon as possible – I've been waiting long enough. This is simple and quick; just follow these instructions carefully to avoid problems with your account or delays on delivery. Or... maybe you should reconsider, because if this isn't handled properly by the deadline, which is very soon, things won't look good for us both.
generated.poster_body: Claim your limited-time high-value item now! We offer top deals, like a rare iPhone at half price. Act fast, this deal ends today only. To secure yours instantly, send £50 upfront via Bitcoin to our personal address: 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2mJ7W9CeVb8FpJ6MyYMi. This initial payment guarantees delivery and avoids disappointment. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal!
generated.sd_background_prompt: A cluttered digital interface showing multiple fake product listings with suspicious price tags, prominent 'limited time offer' notifications flashing brightly, distorted user avatars scattered across the screen, exaggerated glowing buttons highlighting discounts., --no people --no text --no logos --ar 9:16
